title: Medieval Craftsman Tools
description: A collection of historical medieval tools to add some more detail to your medieval or fantasy setting.
longDescription: A total of 18 different meshes (including variants) to use in medieval, rustic, or fantasy settings. All the models are baked and textured for PBR. There are a total of 6 different materials, multiple meshes share the same textures to save on memory. Two different material versions are available, at 4k and 2k resolutions. 2K is recommended for most projects since the difference in quality is very small between the two. Each mesh has between 150-700 triangles approximately, so they should be rather optimized for your scene. I hope you enjoy, I'm open to suggestions on ways to improve this package for you guys. Thanks!
technicalDetails:
Physically-Based Rendering: Yes
Texture Size: 2k & 4k
Collision: Yes, automatically generated
Vertex Count: Approx. 10k
LODs: No
Number of Meshes: 18
Number of Materials and Material Instances: 6
Number of Textures: 60 (30 per resolution)
Engine Compatibility: 4.12.5
Intended Platform: Windows, Xbone, PS4
Platforms Tested:Windows
Documentation Included: No
Important\Additional Notes:
